title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, November 25, 2020
description: It's the birthday of physician and essayist Lewis Thomas (1913-1993), who said, "The great secret of doctors...is that most things get better by themselves."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of physician and essayist Lewis Thomas (1913-1993), who said, "The great secret of doctors...is that most things get better by themselves."
